    • Field Detail

      • LOGGER

        static final org.slf4j.Logger LOGGER
        Logger to print information.

    • Method Detail

      • loadOntModelFromFile

        static org.apache.jena.ontology.OntModel loadOntModelFromFile(org.apache.jena.ontology.OntModel ontModel,
                                                              String path)
                                                       throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method loads the ontology from the fileSystem/external-resource into an ontModel. The ontModel can be given by argument or a new default ontModel, based on OWL_DL_MEM, is created.
        Parameters:
        ontModel - is the base model to load the ontology. If null a default ontModel, based on OWL_DL_MEM, is created.
        path - is the path name to the file, which should be loaded.
        Returns:
        an ontModel with data from the filesystem.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case the ontModel could not be created or the file path is wrong.

      • saveOntModel

        static void saveOntModel(org.apache.jena.ontology.OntModel ontModel,
                         String fileName,
                         String filePath)
                  throws IOException
        Method saves the ontModel as file with name in a specific path. The file has the RDF/XML format and the format .owl.
        Parameters:
        ontModel - is the ontModel, which should be saved.
        fileName - is the name of the file.
        filePath - is the file path. If null the path is default: src/fileName.owl.
        Throws:
        IOException - is thrown in case the ontModel could not be saved.

      • askQuery

        static boolean askQuery(String query,
                        org.apache.jena.ontology.OntModel ontModel)
                 throws org.apache.jena.shared.JenaException
        Method processes an ASK query on a local ontModel and returns the bool solution.
        Parameters:
        query - is the ASK query.
        ontModel - is the local ontModel, which should be asked.
        Returns:
        the solution boolean.
        Throws:
        org.apache.jena.shared.JenaException - is thrown in case the ASK query could not executed.

      • selectQuery

        static void selectQuery(String query,
                        org.apache.jena.ontology.OntModel ontModel)
                 throws org.apache.jena.shared.JenaException
        Method processes a SELECT query on a local ontModel and prints the result to the console.
        Parameters:
        query - is the SELECT query.
        ontModel - is the local ontModel, which should be asked.
        Throws:
        org.apache.jena.shared.JenaException - is thrown in case the SELECT query could not executed.
